Class ClientDescriptor

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.server.ClientDescriptor
public class ClientDescriptor extends Object
Represents a unique Client connected to the server, can be tied to a Player object and to a ClientConnection.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientDescriptor

      public ClientDescriptor(String username, ClientConnection connection)
      Constructs a ClientDescriptor object with the provided names and connection.
      Parameters:
      username - Username, unique to the client.
      connection - ClientConnection Connection used to send messages to the client.

  • Method Details

    • bindPlayer

      public void bindPlayer(Player p)
      Bind a Player object to this descriptor.
      Parameters:
      p - Player Player to be linked.

    • unbindPlayer

      public void unbindPlayer()
      Unbinds any Player from this descriptor.

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage(ClientMessage m) throws IOException
      Sends a ClientMessage using the ClientConnection tied to the descriptor.
      Parameters:
      m - ClientMessage Message to be sent.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there are any connection related issues during the process.

      public String getUsername()

      public int getID()

    • setID

      public void setID(int id)
      Tie descriptor to a new Lobby ID.
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the new lobby tied to the descriptor.

      public Player getPlayer()

    • setPingTimerTask

      public void setPingTimerTask(TimerTask task)
      Sets a new callback TimerTask to be executed on timeout.
      Parameters:
      task - TimerTask Ping callback task to be called in case of a timeout.
